mapper.select: SELECT idColaborador, c.nombre, apellidoPaterno, apellidoMaterno, noPersonal, correo, curp, password, c.idRol, r.nombre AS rol FROM colaborador c INNER JOIN rol r ON c.idRol = r.idRol

SELECT idColaborador, c.nombre, apellidoPaterno, apellidoMaterno, noPersonal, correo, curp, password, c.idRol, r.nombre AS rol FROM colaborador c INNER JOIN rol r ON c.idRol = r.idRol WHERE noPersonal = #{noPersonal}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO colaborador(nombre, apellidoPaterno, apellidoMaterno, noPersonal, correo, curp, password, idRol) VALUES (#{nombre}, #{apellidoPaterno}, #{apellidoMaterno}, #{noPersonal}, #{correo}, #{curp}, #{password}, #{idRol})
